member.name: PROCESS_LOOPBACK_MODE
member.summary: Specifies the loopback mode for an structure passed into a call to .

member.name: PROCESS_LOOPBACK_MODE.PROCESS_LOOPBACK_MODE_INCLUDE_TARGET_PROCESS_TREE
member.summary: Render streams from the specified process and its child processes are included in the activated process loopback stream.

member.name: PROCESS_LOOPBACK_MODE.PROCESS_LOOPBACK_MODE_EXCLUDE_TARGET_PROCESS_TREE
member.summary: Render streams from the specified process and its child processes are excluded from the activated process loopback stream.
